channel.title: Arista 459
channel.description:
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/ff8tiu.png[/img] I will be using the 459 released by Scully, I will update it with small ones. If anyone wants to be part of it please post an application. You don't have to be pro to code. [b]Application:
Name: Experiance: Spot (Tester, bug finder, fixer, coding):
[/b] [b][u]Change Log:[/b][/u] [code]-Got all fixes to run it - 1st day of project. - Made the 459 client renamed so it's easier, still got to work on the renaming a bit cuz i got class a, b - 3-31-10[/CODE] I already have the 3 floors of warriors guild, thanks to Berky. For some extras: [size=14pt]Features[/size] [size=14pt]Npc Loading[/size] [ul] [*]Spawning [*]PERFECT Combat [*]Walking [*]Clipped Walking [*]Clipped Following [/ul] [size=14pt]Combat[/size] [ul][*]Npc Combat [*] Following [*] Facing [*] Clipping [*] This monster is already in combat [/ul] [size=14pt]Player Combat[/size] [ul][*] Clipped Following [*] Facing [*] 1v1 [*] Multi [*] Skulling System [/ul] [size=14pt]Banking[/size] [ul] [*] Item saving [*] Noting support [*] Storing & withdrawing (1,5,10,X,All) [*] Re Arranging with saving positions [*] Deposit Boxes [/ul] [size=14pt]Trading[/size] [ul][*] Anti-Dupe System [*] Confirm screen [*] Offering & Removing (1,5,10,X,All) [*] Other players available inventory slots [/ul] [size=14pt]Music[/size] [ul][*] Music in certain areas [/ul] [size=14pt]Quest points[/size] [ul][*] Adding points up when quest is finished [/ul] [size=14pt]F2P Quest Progress[/size] [ul] [*] Black Knight's Fortress [*] Cook's Assistant [*] Demon Slayer [*] Doric's Quest [*] Dragon Slayer [*] Ernest the Chicken [*] Goblin Diplomacy [*] Imp Catcher [*] The Knights Sword [*] Pirate's Treasure [*] Prince Ali Rescue [*] The Restless ghost [*] Romeo & Juliet [*] Rune Mysteries [*] Sheep Shearer [*] Shield of Arrav [*] Vampire Slayer [*] Witch's Potion[/ul] [size=14pt]Members Quests Finished[/size] [ul] [*] 100% Lost City [/ul] [size=14pt]Mini-Games[/size] [ul][*] Fight Caves [*] Fight Pits [*] Duel Arena [*] Pest Control [*] Castle Wars [*] Warrior's Guild [*] Barrows [*] Barbarian Assault [/ul] [size=14pt]Skills[/size] [ul] [*] [size=13pt]Agility[/size] [list] [*]Influence how long you'll be able to Run. [*] Failing Obstacles [*] Restoring Your Energy [*] Gnome Agility Course [*] Skullball [*] Agility Pyramid [*] Penguin Agility Course [*] Barbarian Outpost Course [*] Brimhaven Agility Arena [*] Monkey Agility Course [*] Wilderness Agility Course [*] Werewolf Fetch Game [*] Yanille Agility Dungeon [*] Dorgesh-Kaan Agility Course [*] [*] Gaining Tickets [*] Rewards [/list] [*] [size=13pt]Construction[/size] [list] [*] Stat-Boosting Items [*] Servants [*] Flatpacks [*] Gardens [*] Parlours [*] Kitchens [*] Dining Rooms [*] Workshops [*] Bedrooms [*] Skill Halls [*] Games Rooms [*] Combat Rooms [*] Quest Halls [*] Studies [*] Menageries [*] Costume Rooms [*] Chapels [*] Portal Chambers [*] Formal Gardens [*] Throne Rooms [*] Oubliette [*] Dungeon Rooms [*] Treasure Rooms [*] Real Estate Agents [*] Sawmill Operator [*] Stonemason [*] Garden Supplier [*] Herald (Sir Renitee) [*] Taxidermist [/list] [*] [size=13pt]Cooking[/size] [list] [*]Helpful Drinks [*] Cooking Gauntlets [*] All Fish [*] All Foods [/list] [*] [size=13pt]Crafting[/size] [list] [*]Pottery [*] Leather [*] Snakeskin Armor [*] Dragonhide Leather [*] Jewelry [*] Weaving [*] Glass Making [*] Battle Staffs [*] Spinning [/list] [*] [size=13pt]Farming[/size] [list] [*]Obtaining Seeds [*] Farming Tools [*] Farming Plots [*] Preparing Plots [*] Growing Your Crops [*] Protecting Your Plants [*] Produce Containers [*] Other Events & Items [/list] [*] [size=13pt]Firemaking[/size] [list] [*] All Logs [*] Lanterns [*] Firelighters [*] Clipped Autowalk [*] Other Items [/list] [*] [size=13pt]Fishing[/size] [list] [*] Fishing Gear [*] Catching Fish [*] Fishing Guild [*] Random Events [/list] [*] [size=13pt]Fletching[/size] [list] [*] Fletching Arrows [*] Fletching Bows [*] Fletching Crossbows [*] Darts [*] Composite Bow & Brutal Arrows [*] Bolts [/list] [*] [size=13pt]Herblore[/size] [list] [*] Obtaining Herbs [*] Obtaining Vials [*] Creating Potions [*] Combining & Emptying Potions [*] Greenman's Ale [*] Cleaning Herbs [*] All Ingredients [*] All Potions [*] Exchanging Goutweed [*] Sinister Chest [/list] [*] [size=13pt]Hunter[/size] [list] [*] Hunting Equipment [*] Hunting Areas [*] Birds [*] Butterflies [*] Deadfall Traps [*] Box Traps [*] Net Traps [*] Pitfall Traps [*] Falconry [*] Imps [*] Rabbits [*] Lassoing [*] Hunter Clothing [/list] [*] [size=13pt]Mining[/size] [list] [*] Mining All Ores [*] Obtaining Gems [*] Dwarven Stouts [*] Mature Stouts & Beer [*] Braindeath Rum [*] Pickaxe Requirements [*] Limestone [*] Rune Essence [*] Blurite [*] Elemental [/list] [*] [size=13pt]Prayer[/size] [list] [*] Stat-Boosting Altars [*] Bone burying [*] Ectofuntus [*] Protect Prayers [*] Amulets & Symbols [*] Prayers [*] Clothing [*] Maces & Other Weapons [*] Prayer Books [*] Having Symbols Blessed [/list] [*] [size=13pt]Runecrafting[/size] [list] [*] Runecrafting Pouches [*] Rune Essence [*] Pure Rune Essence [*] Talismans [*] Tiaras [*] Runecrafting Altars [*] Abyss [*] Crafting Runes [/list] [*] [size=13pt]Slayer[/size] [list] [*] Slayer Masters [*] Low level Tasks [*] Medium level Tasks [*] High level Tasks [*] The Enchanted Gem [*] Ring of Slayer [*] Equipment [*] Slayer Dungeons [/list] [*] [size=13pt]Smithing[/size] [list] [*] Dwarven Stouts [*] Mature Stouts & Beer [*] Smelting Ores [*] Smelting with Magic [*] Ring of Forging [*] Smithing Gauntlets [*] Smithing Bronze [*] Smithing Blurite [*] Smithing Iron [*] Smithing Elemental [*] Smithing Steel [*] Smithing Mithril [*] Smithing Adamant [*] Smithing Rune [/list] item.title: Arista 459
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

[quote=“wolfs goal, post:6, topic:334387”][quote author=Pouch link=topic=430788.msg3163009#msg3163009 date=1269745892]
no, hyperions is the cleanest you can get, and everything is programmed cleanly.

The way it was written is as ALMOST good as graham, so it’s not bad at all.
[/quote]

Bull shit, they fucked the code up, everyone knows it…You just downloaded the server, you have no idea what your doing when you go through the files, so you come here asking for people to help you code your pathetic leeched source. Not only this, you have no idea what a 459 is, you just followed the video to hook it up. While other people are doing the work for you, you just sit back and think your an ownage coder because you downloaded something someone was stupid enough to release. I hate to say it, no I don’t you suck nuts go fuck yourself and stop leeching other peoples servers, that goes for all you fucking noobs that are going to try and make a 459 server even though you know nothing, some people however like berky know what they are doing and some like this ass bang don’t know shit…so heres the thing…the reason why I’m typing a book basically is because you guys suck massive balls…no joke, massive balls, dropped in your moms mouth like the half eaten chicken my friends mom offered to 2 black people…[/quote]

Says the person with an smfforfree forum. You can’t even afford a domain name so gtfo.

Read full topic

Experiance: 3-4 years in html,java,c++ (even though java is what matters the most =p); I owned,coded, and hosted Legendz PK (over 6500 players); experience in advertisement.
Spot (Tester, bug finder, fixer, coding): server/client bug fixer, coder, and I can also 24/7 host if you want. Honestly, whatever of these you want me to do

And don’t listen to those people calling you a leecher, you’re just a guy trying to make his server awesome.[/quote]
